messages.content:
Subject: Invitation to Join "The Rise of Indie Gaming" Episode 🎮

Hi Sofia,

I’m Alex Morgan, host of the "GameTalks" podcast. I’ve been following IndieGame Labs and was blown away by the storytelling and community vibes behind *Echoes of Dawn*.

Our upcoming episode, **"The Rise of Indie Gaming: Stories Behind the Hits,"** will explore how indie creators turn passion projects into cultural phenomena. Given your experience both as a developer and a community builder, I think you’d bring an incredibly insightful and inspiring perspective that our listeners – many of whom have shown a strong interest in indie video games – would love to hear.

Would you be available for a 30‑minute virtual chat sometime in the next two weeks? We’re flexible with timing and can accommodate your schedule.

Looking forward to possibly having you on the show!

Best regards,
Alex Morgan
Host, GameTalks Podcast
alex@gametalks.com
Here’s the draft email you can send to Sofia. Feel free to edit any part of it, and let me know if you’d like me to adjust the tone or add more details.
